name: Flashing/Capping Installation Checklist
template name: Roof Straight Standing Seam - Flashing/Capping Installation Checklist

name: Barge Capping - (gutterline to central box gutter)
Flashings / Cappings: Straight and in correct plane.
Fixed adequately to hold flashing in place and prevent vibration in strong winds.
Silicone sealed under laps and where necessary to make waterproof.
Rivets and fixings sealed where necessary
Area clean and free of debris
Inspected and accepted by S&H authorised representative as complying with relevant Australian Standard and legislation
Inspected and accepted by Authorized Representative
All items have been completed and demonstrated satisfactorily
